entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain showers or flurries before morning. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 near midnight then southeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
